name: TeamPunk (itch)
description:
In October 2022 we started as a student team to create our first 3D game together as part of the Game Design & Development Minor course at the Rotterdam University of Applied Sciences, with 5 developers, 4 designers, 5 artists and 1 producer. As a team of 15 we had a lot of ideas for how we wanted to game to be and feel. We got together and looked at what we enjoyed in a game and we came up with a an idea to have a moving convoy, which players needed to protect along a route. After couple of iterations, TeamPunk is born.

Controls:

Keyboard & mouse:

  • WASD to move
  • Move the mouse to aim, Left mouse button to fire.
  • E to heal your character.

Controller:

  • Left analog to move.
  • Right analog to aim.
  • Right trigger to fire.
  • Left trigger to heal your character.

Singleplayer requires either a mouse and keyboard or a controller to play. In order to play local multiplayer, controllers are mandatory (with support up to 4 controllers).

System requirements:
    MINIMUM:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6200U
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 520
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 500 MB available space
    • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
